desc: Tessere is home to the finest luxury Italian men's & women's fashion brands, Kiton, Kired, Sartorio, Marco Pescarolo, Svevo, Don The Fuller, Santoni, Harris & more. We have men's suits, sports jackets, trousers, golfers, premium jeans, sneakers, shoes, plus the finest dresses, skirts & blouses from Kiton.

layout.text: Home To The Finest Italian Luxury Brands
